byline.original: By LESLIE PICKER and QUENTIN HARDY

abstract: Analog Devices agrees to buy Linear Technology Corporation for $14.8 billion; semiconductor industry is undergoing vigorous consolidation.

headline.print_headline: Chip Maker Analog Devices to Buy Linear Technology
headline.main: Semiconductor Industry Shrinks Some More With Latest Deal

snippet: Analog Devices will acquire the Linear Technology Corporation, as pricing pressures and low profit margins force more consolidations in the sector....
lead_paragraph: Analog Devices will acquire the Linear Technology Corporation, as pricing pressures and low profit margins force more consolidations in the sector.
